name: CatDog: Saving Mean Bob
summary: CatDog: Saving Mean Bob was a cancelled action video game based on the popular Nicktoon CatDog for the original PlayStation and PC. Not much is known about it, other than the fact that Robert Lamoreaux worked on the game while he was also working on the PC game CatDog: Quest for the Golden Hydrant and that it would've been developed by KnowWare and published by Hasbro Interactive.
